text: aur jo auraten haiz se maayoos ho chukee agar tum ko unake idde mein shaq hove to unaka idda teen maheene hai aur (ala haazal qayaas) vah auraten jinako haiz hua hee nahin aur haamela auraton ka idda unaka bachcha janana hai aur jo khuda se darata hai khuda usake kaam me sahoolit paida karega
